nodes.text: HK-58 Besh was a HK-series assassin droid used by HK-47 in his attempts to take over the planet Mustafar. It was destroyed by a group of spacers who went on to defeat HK-47.

HK-58 Besh was linked with its twin, Aurek, and if either Aurek or Besh fell, and the other wasn't destroyed within five seconds, its comrade would rise and continue fighting. Both HK-58 Besh and Aurek used distruptor weapons built into their arms, much like the smaller HK-77.
